summary: The diff only modifies project_state.json and does not show any changes to the generated image assets, LandingPage hero logo usage, or favicon reference. As a result, the requested profile/logo and favicon updates (and the removal of any visible “Cardiology” text in those images) are not implemented in the provided diff.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the site profile/logo image to reflect the newly uploaded file by regenerating the existing generated profile image asset used on the landing page hero, keeping the referenced path "/assets/generated/kvr-hospital-profile.dim_512x512.png".
missing_requirements.reason: No changes are shown to the profile/logo image asset under /assets/generated, nor any related frontend code that would ensure the landing page hero visually matches the newly uploaded image while still referencing the same path.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the site favicon by regenerating the existing generated favicon asset referenced in frontend/index.html, keeping the referenced path "/assets/generated/kvr-hospital-favicon.dim_32x32.png".
missing_requirements.reason: No changes are shown to the favicon image asset under /assets/generated and no changes are shown to frontend/index.html to validate continued reference/no 404s.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure the updated profile/logo image and favicon derived from the uploaded image do not display the word "Cardiology" anywhere.
missing_requirements.reason: There are no image asset updates in the diff, so there is no evidence that the generated profile/logo and favicon were regenerated to remove/avoid any visible "Cardiology" text.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking/metadata (project_state.json) without implementing the requested frontend asset updates.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks for updating the generated profile/logo image and favicon assets (and ensuring no "Cardiology" text). The diff shows only a modification to project_state.json, which is not requested as part of these requirements.
